description: Base 14 complement of n (write n in base 14, then replace each digit by its base 14 negative).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2743 (2743 = 14^3 - 1)
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
prog: (Haskell)a055124 0 = 0a055124 n = if d == 0 then 14 * a055124 n' else 14 * a055124 n' + 14 - d            where (n', d) = divMod n 14-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 12 2014
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 19 2000
